headline: Jim Cramer Says Constellation Brands is “Four Times Cursed”
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. During the episode, Cramer called the company “four times cursed,” as he commented: “Or how about Constellation Brands? The alcohol company has been four times cursed. GLP-1 drugs cut the craving for beer. Gummies give you the same high… […]
